feed.title: Marry Xmas and Happy New Year
feed.subtitle: You'll get better next year. Keep going!

entry.title: My garbage final project
entry.content:
This is my garbage final project.

Everyone make mistakes. The most important thing is to face the problem and deal with it. Stop shirking and you will be better next year.

Merry Xmas and happy new year!
entry.summary: This is my garbage final project.
